publicwhip.spmotion: S1M-2.1 Dennis Canavan: As a amendment to the motion in the name of Mr Jim Wallace leave out from "and" in line 4 to end and insert "and noting that the majority of members of this Parliament were elected on commitments to abolish tuition fees, demands that tuition fees be abolished and student grants introduced" (lodged 19 May). Supported by: Tommy Sheridan

S1M-2.1 Dennis Canavan: As an amendment to the motion in the name of Mr Jim Wallace, leave out from "and" in line 4 to end and insert "and noting that the majority of members of this Parliament were elected on commitments to abolish tuition fees, demands that tuition fees be abolished and student grants introduced" (lodged on 19 May 1999). Supported by: Tommy Sheridan

Supported by: Tommy Sheridan

(lodged on 19 May 1999) Supported by: Tommy Sheridan

Supported by: *Tommy Sheridan
